sense.def:
To sift a powder-like substance
pomeni stresti praškasto snov, na primer moko ali pesek, skozi sito, da odstranimo primesi ali večje koščke.

seg.quote: Always sift icing sugar through a fine sieve.

sense.def:
To sift through something
pomeni temeljito pregledati nekaj, na primer dokazno gradivo.

seg.quote: There are archives and documents to be sifted through.
He was accustomed to sifting evidence.
